parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: Full path and filename of the settings to restore ( *.sldreg ) (see Remarks )

parameters.name: SystemOptions
parameters.description: True to restore system options, false to not

parameters.name: ToolbarLayout
parameters.description: True to restore the toolbar layout, false to not

parameters.name: KeyboardShortcuts
parameters.description: True to restore keyboard shortcuts, false to not (see Remarks )

parameters.name: MouseGestures
parameters.description: True to restore mouse gestures, false to not

parameters.name: MenuCustomization
parameters.description: True to restore menu customizations, false to not

parameters.name: SavedViews
parameters.description: True to restore saved views, false to not (see Remarks )

parameters.name: CreateBackup
parameters.description: True to create a backup of the current settings, false to not (see Remarks )

title: ISldWorks.RestoreSettings
description: Restores the specified SOLIDWORKS settings from the specified *.sldreg file.
signature:
System.Int32 RestoreSettings( 
   System.String
FileName
,
   System.Boolean
SystemOptions
,
   System.Boolean
ToolbarLayout
,
   System.Boolean
KeyboardShortcuts
,
   System.Boolean
MouseGestures
,
   System.Boolean
MenuCustomization
,
   System.Boolean
SavedViews
,
   System.Boolean
CreateBackup
)

parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: Full path and filename of the settings to restore ( *.sldreg ) (see Remarks )

parameters.name: SystemOptions
parameters.description: True to restore system options, false to not

parameters.name: ToolbarLayout
parameters.description: True to restore the toolbar layout, false to not

parameters.name: KeyboardShortcuts
parameters.description: True to restore keyboard shortcuts, false to not (see Remarks )

parameters.name: MouseGestures
parameters.description: True to restore mouse gestures, false to not

parameters.name: MenuCustomization
parameters.description: True to restore menu customizations, false to not

parameters.name: SavedViews
parameters.description: True to restore saved views, false to not (see Remarks )

parameters.name: CreateBackup
parameters.description: True to create a backup of the current settings, false to not (see Remarks )

returns: Error code as defined in swSaveRestoreSettingsResults_e
remarks:
This method is valid only if
ISldWorks::SaveSettings
was called previously.
KeyboardShortcuts and SavedViews are valid only if these settings were previously saved using ISldWorks::SaveSettings.
If CreateBackup is true, this method backs up the current settings to
backup_
userid
_
yyyymmdd
_
hhmms
s
.sldreg
in the same location as specified in FileName.
For C++ only, specify all System.bool parameters using VARIANT_TRUE (-1) and VARIANT_FALSE (0).
